name: Horizon Rush
description:
This is a small project which i have been working for a month  its similar to subway surfers but you play as a car avoiding cars and your speed gradually increases making it difficult to avoid them. there is even a speeding functionality so you can go really fast for a limited time .

I have been in game development for over a year so this my 6th game which i have made so its not mind blowing but i hope you guys have fun for at least 5 min 

Instructions to download 

  • download the file given below 
  • download win rar or 7zip to extract the downloaded file
  • after extracting you will get a file called odd levels
  • click it and click oddlevels.exe and your game should run

Controls

  • A and D for left and right
  • left arrow and right arrow key for left and right movement
  • space bar to boost 
  • esc to exit the game anytime
